DOC.brief_summary: The investigator propose perform clinical randomize trial evaluate effect single embryo ( blastocyst ) transfer ( SET ) array CGH evaluation complete chromosome complement blastocyst comparison standard ART method one embryo replace . Patients randomize two group : - Control group : patient two embryo replace day 5 base morphological developmental characteristic , embryos reach blastocyst stage vitrify . If patient control group pregnancy term fresh cycle , offer free PGD either frozen embryo cycle next cycle ( center patient ) . Data PGD part study . - Test group : patient grade A , B C blastocyst hatch day 5 , biopsied day 5 , analyze array CGH , single euploid embryo transfer day 6 . Any morulas develop grade A , B C blastocyst day-6 also analyze vitrify use future cycle .
DOC.brief_title: Preimplantation Genetic Diagnosis Using Blastocyst Biopsy Array CGH
DOC.detailed_description: Patients randomize fertilization , drop study produce 3 less blastocyst day 5 . The Primary efficacy endpoint compare study group control ( I ) implantation rate ( II ) multiple pregnancy ( twin high order ) compare first transfer . The study may extend evaluate secondary efficacy endpoint miscarriage rate take home baby rate compare two group .
DOC.criteria: Maternal age 33 42 year old ( include ) MESA TESE patient At least one partner carrier chromosomal genetic disease Abnormal ovarian reserve , define FSH > 10 IU/L day 24 cycle AMH < 1ng /ml ( If one two parameter alter patient acceptable ) . Egg donor cycle ( sperm donor acceptable ) Exclusion criterion stimulation : Less eight antral follicle day 24 cycle Exclusion criterion day 5 post retrieval : Patients exclude produce less 3 grade A , B C blastocysts day 5 .
